description.value: DepartmentIdentificationNumber Codelist. The DepartmentIdentificationNumber represents the unique identification number assigned to a healthcare organization's internal department or ward within Belgium. This identification number must be listed in the dataset [Internal organization of departments within Belgian healthcare organizations](https://fair.healthdata.be/dataset/53c8b040-0b48-4c41-ab65-4c9d1600e908), which is referenced in the `include.system` URI of this ValueSet. It is imperative to note that the present dataset serves as a temporary solution. Future iterations will introduce a more structured and standardized version, the details of which will be documented in this specification.
